projects.title: React Youtube Client
projects.description: A YouTube client made with React for the 2021 Wizeline React Certification.
projects.learned: On this project i learned React development best practices and common patterns. Some concepts applied to this project are Styling, Theming, Hooks, Custom Hooks, Context, Auth, Testing with Jest/React testing library.

projects.title: Correlation Covid-19
projects.description: Webpage that shows the relation between patients' health pre-covid and the number of deaths.
projects.learned: I learned to clean a dataset in order to use it to train a statistic model and make predictions of the results based on known data.

projects.title: Seguimiento Reprobaci√≥n
projects.description: Web application created to keep an eye on the failure rates of my college.
projects.learned: For this project i made use of the Django framework, vanilla javascript, css and html and a database on MongoDB.

projects.title: Personal Learning Environment
projects.description: Web app for sharing files and urls for learning purposes.
projects.learned: This was the first project and biggest project i worked on using Go and MongoDB, it was also one of the first projects i made intended for real use.

projects.title: Social Apex
projects.description: Social media platform created for players of Apex Legends
projects.learned: This was a funny side project i made with a friend in order to practice some React and Django. I learned a lot of both technologies and also practiced some MySQL knowledge i already had.

projects.title: Ignite Shop
projects.description: Fake online store thats sells products decorated with AI generated images.
projects.learned: This was a really cool project me and some friends made for a college subject, i learned a bit about deep learning because i had to use GANS to generate images based on an album cover dataset, then, using flask we made a simple API that returned an image generated with our trained model, then, using a superresolution model we scaled up the images to place it over another one of a cup or a shirt, which then was saved to firebase and used to load the products view on the frontend.

projects.title: Mercedes CRM
projects.description: A project for college where i did a CRM for a car dealership
projects.learned: This is a very simple project made with Django, vanilla javascript + tailwindCSS and a database in MySQL.
